tour.item.cardDescription: This is an example card. All the information you see can be enabled or disabled in your preferences!
tour.step1.text: Hello! This is your profile menu. Click here to access your information, groups, friends, templates, and preferences.
tour.step1.title: Welcome to KanbanDeep!
tour.step10.text: Click here to add a new card (task) to the first column of your board. It's the fastest way to record a new idea.
tour.step10.title: Add Tasks
tour.step11.text: This is your toolbox. Use it to undo/redo actions, export, or print your board.
tour.step11.title: Actions Menu
tour.step12.text: Need to share your board in a presentation or report? Use this option to generate a high-quality PNG image.
tour.step12.title: Export as Image
tour.step13.text: Take your board to the physical world. Ideal for planning meetings or for having an overview on your wall.
tour.step13.title: Print Your Board
tour.step14.text: Let's create a board for you to get started. Watch how it appears on the screen, ready to use.
tour.step14.title: Creating Your First Board...
tour.step15.text: Now, let's add the first column to your new board. Columns represent the stages of your workflow.
tour.step15.title: Adding a Column...
tour.step16.text: Finally, an example card. It contains all possible details, like date, tags, and assignee. Remember you can hide this information in 'Preferences'.
tour.step16.title: And Your First Task!
tour.step17.text: You've learned the essentials! Drag and drop items to organize and use the right-click for quick actions. We hope KanbanDeep will be a great ally in your daily life. We're in this journey together!
tour.step17.title: All Set!
tour.step2.text: Here you can access and manage all the groups you participate in or administer, making team collaboration easier.
tour.step2.title: Your Groups
tour.step3.text: Create and manage board and tag templates to speed up the creation of new projects with workflows you already use.
tour.step3.title: Your Templates
tour.step4.text: Stay on top of everything. Here you receive alerts about tasks, group invitations, and messages.
tour.step4.title: Your Notifications
tour.step5.text: Access 'Preferences' to adjust themes, colors, fonts, and what is displayed on the cards, making the system your own.
tour.step5.title: Customize Your Experience
tour.step6.text: This is the main menu for managing your boards. From here, you can select, create, and edit your workspaces.
tour.step6.title: Boards Menu
tour.step7.text: Easily switch between your 'Personal' and 'Group' boards to focus on what matters at the moment.
tour.step7.title: Filter Your View
tour.step8.text: Use this button to create a new board from scratch or from a template, starting a new project quickly.
tour.step8.title: Create New Boards
tour.step9.text: With a board selected, click here to add columns that will represent the stages of your workflow.
tour.step9.title: Add Columns
tour.step_add_card_menu.text: Use the 'Add Card' button to create a new task. You can also add cards directly to each column.
tour.step_add_card_menu.title: Add Tasks (Cards)
tour.step_board_selector.text: Use this selector to quickly navigate between your available boards in the current filter.
tour.step_board_selector.title: Select Your Board
tour.step_friends.text: Manage your friends list, accept requests, and find new people to connect and collaborate with.
tour.step_friends.title: Your Friends
tour.step_profile.text: Access and edit all your personal information, contact details, and privacy preferences.
tour.step_profile.title: Your Profile
tour.step_save_template.text: Like a board's structure? Save it as a template to create new boards with the same setup in seconds.
tour.step_save_template.title: Reuse Your Work
ui.unsavedChanges: Sie haben ungespeicherte √Ñnderungen. M√∂chten Sie trotzdem verlassen?
